column1: S.A. Aziz, K.R. McConkey, K. Tanalgo, T. Sritongchuay, M-R. Low, J.Y. Yong, T.L. Mildenstein, C.E Nuevo-Diego, V.C. Lim & P.A. Racey
Fr = fruit (including fig syconia); Fl = flower (including nectar and/or pollen); L = leaf; Se = seed ingested; B = bark; T = twigs; Sa = sap

C = conflict; D = diet; FM = foraging movement; P = pollination; SD = seed dispersal; SG = seed/spore germination ; NOTE that 'aspect studied/recorded/observed' does not necessarily mean the bat was confirmed as playing that role.
NB: Genus or species epithets followed by (?) are those that were either not found in theplantlist.org or are unresolved, and could not be definitively identified or confirmed.
